titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 171 of title 28, United States Code, to allow suit against the United States for injuries and deaths of members of the Armed Forces caused by improper medical care, and for other purposes.
SFC Richard Stayskal Military Medical Accountability Act of 2019
SFC Richard Stayskal Military Medical Accountability Act of 2019
SFC Richard Stayskal Military Medical Accountability Act of 2019

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
